content: A unique and powerful part of blockchain is the use of Merkle tree signature mechanism. One could imaging this could be used to span a set of data that is hosted in FHIR. Thus making a nicely compact signature. This model is more hyper-link friendly; but does not solve the issues we know exist in a REST server http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=FHIR_Digital_Signature_Working_Page
